format: An annual multiple time series from 1960 to 1995 with 10 variables.
title: US Gasoline Market Data (1960–1995, Greene)
description:
Description
Time series data on the US gasoline market.
reference: Online complements to Greene (2003). Table F2.2.

parameters.gas:
Total US gasoline consumption (computed as
total expenditure divided by price index).
parameters.service: Aggregate price index for consumer services.
parameters.nondurable: Aggregate price index for consumer nondurables.
parameters.durable: Aggregate price index for consumer durables.
